notes.text:
Cod or tilapia work great
Add hot sauce for extra kick
Serve with fresh pico de gallo

steps.descr: Mix flour with paprika, salt, and pepper

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by mixing our flour with paprika, salt, and pepper. Give it a good stir until it's all combined.

steps.instructions: Mix flour with paprika, salt, and pepper

steps.descr: Cut fish into strips, coat in flour

on_enter.say: Now, let's cut our fish into lovely strips and coat them in that seasoned flour. Make sure each piece is nicely covered.

steps.instructions: Cut fish into strips, coat in flour

steps.descr: Fry in hot oil until golden and crispy

on_enter.say: Time to fry the fish! Get your oil nice and hot, then fry those strips until they're golden and crispy. You'll hear them sizzle beautifully!

steps.instructions: Fry in hot oil until golden and crispy

steps.descr: Mix cabbage with mayo and lime juice for slaw

on_enter.say: Let's whip up a quick slaw. Mix your shredded cabbage with mayo and a squeeze of lime juice. It'll be fresh and zesty!

steps.instructions: Mix cabbage with mayo and lime juice for slaw

on_enter.say: Let's warm up those tortillas. Just a quick toast on each side until they're nice and pliable.
Brilliant! Now let's fill those warm tortillas with our crispy fish and fresh slaw. It's coming together beautifully!

steps.descr: Top with cilantro and extra lime

on_enter.say: Finally, let's top it all off with some fresh cilantro and a squeeze of extra lime. Perfect!

steps.instructions: Top with cilantro and extra lime

recipe.title: Fish Tacos
recipe.description: Crispy fish with fresh slaw in soft tortillas
